name: Stabilizing Matrix
description: Found in Chests of the Mists and salvaged from ascended rings. Used to stabilize dark energy for the safe construction of items. Can also be traded for Fractal Encryptions.

name: Mirror
description: Used to craft Dusk and Dawn.

name: Maklain's Minstrel's Inscription
description: Used in the crafting of weapons with +Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality.

name: Endless Exalted Bastion Tonic
description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Superior Rune of the Chronomancer

bonuses: Apply 2 seconds of quickness when you cast a well.

description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

name: Dimensional Destabilizer
description: Used to craft Dusk and Dawn.

name: Kudzu Experiment
description: Salvage this weapon to receive its spirit, needed to craft the next tier of this legendary precursor.

name: Bat Mother Cache
description: Double-click to gain champion bags, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, ley-line crystals, a vial of chak acid, and other gear.

name: Quality Book Cover
description: Used to make books.

name: Quetzal Commander's Cache
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains loot from creatures.
<c=@reminder>Affected by magic-find bonuses.</c>

name: Kraitkin Vol. 3
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: A recipe to make an ascended greatsword with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.

name: Star Chart: Great Spirit Bear
description: Double-click to combine the four norn star charts into the Norn Constellation Chapter.

details.description:
+10% Damage Reduction
+70 Toughness

description: You might be able to charge this peculiar swamp moss at a specially charged energy storage tank in the Opticalium in Metrica Province.

name: Solution: Upper Bound
description: Used to craft the backpack Upper Bound. Extras can be purchased from the Aetherblade Quartermaster in the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal for Balls of Dark Energy.

description: Double-click to combine the Volatile Spores, Bloodsucker Enzymes, Beetle Juice, Frothy Troll Saliva, Malodorous Mucus, and Salivary Stone in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Concentrated Maguuma Bacteria.

name: Honeypot Ant
description: <c=@flavor>Sweet, yet squirmy.<c>

Use in the mystic forge with an agony infusion, an ascended ring, and a philosopher's stone to craft an attuned ascended ring.
Can be bought inside the Fractals of the Mists once you have trained Agony Channeler in the Fractal Attunement Mastery line.
